name: Special Courier
description:
Special things require special attitude!

Special Courier is a simulator where everything is based on maximum realism to create the right atmosphere for the game.

You as the the main hero, you'll be a delivery man which will travel around the city with special cars to deliver products from point A to B whose name is strictly secret.

Game Features :
- 6 special cars
- Different special levels
- Realistic driving
- MiniMap
- Car physics
